dt: {bc}an implement for shaping food into a ball or removing a core
{bc}an athlete who plays a sport that involves the use of a ball

dt.t: In '98, Kobe represented again as the youngest {wi}baller{/wi} in history to play in an NBA All-Star game.

dt: {bc}a wealthy and successful person who lives lavishly

dt.t: The next day he received a stack of cards listing his name and a new title: {wi}Baller{/wi}. That is hip hop for … a big shot.

shortdef: an implement for shaping food into a ball or removing a core
an athlete who plays a sport that involves the use of a ball; especially : a basketball player
a wealthy and successful person who lives lavishly
